message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I value your interest, $12,000 is significantly below what I need to make this sale worthwhile. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product for $13,500.  This reflects a fair price that considers both of our needs. Let's see if we can come to an agreement at this price.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort you've put into this. I am still interested in purchasing your product, but I would like to stick to my budget of $12,000. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
